extensionDescription.message: Hallitse evästeitäsi! Poista käyttämättömät evästeet automaattisesti suljetuilta välilehdiltä, kuitenkin säilyttäen valitsemasi evästeet.
extensionDescription.description: Control your cookies! Automatically delete unwanted cookies from your closed tabs while keeping the ones you want.

notificationTitle.description: Cookies were deleted!  Used in Notification Title.

cookieCleanupIgnoreOpenTabsText.message: Puhdista kaikki, avointen välilehtien evästeet myös
cookieCleanupIgnoreOpenTabsText.description: Run cleanup now, include cookies from open tabs

welcomeMessage.message: Moikka! Tämän istunnon aikana $cadTitle$ on poistanut $sessionDeleted$ evästettä ja yhteensä $totalDeleted$ evästettä.
welcomeMessage.description: Hi there! During this session, Cookie AutoDelete has deleted 123 cookies and in total 456 cookies.

oldReleasesText.message: Older release notes can be viewed online at
oldReleasesText.description: Older release notes can be viewed online at

reasonKeepOpenTab.message: Keep because of open tabs of *.$mainDomain$
reasonKeepOpenTab.description: Keep because of open tabs of *.google.com

reasonCleanStartupNoList.message: Clean because of startup cleanup and $hostname$ is not in the White or Grey lists
reasonCleanStartupNoList.description: Clean because of startup cleanup and sub.google.com is not in the White or Grey lists

reasonCleanGreyList.message: Clean because of startup cleanup and $matchedExpression$ is in the Greylist
reasonCleanGreyList.description: Clean because of startup cleanup and *.google.com is in the Greylist

reasonCleanNoList.message: Clean because $hostname$ is not in the White or Grey lists
reasonCleanNoList.description: Clean because sub.google.com is not in the White or Grey lists

reasonKeep.message: Keep because of matched $matchedExpression$ in the $listType$
reasonKeep.description: Keep because of matched *.google.com in the Whitelist

reasonCleanCookieName.message: Partial clean because of matched $matchedExpression$ in the $listType$
reasonCleanCookieName.description: Partial clean because of matched *.google.com in the Whitelist

reasonTabsWereNotIgnored.description: Clean because of sub.google.com is not in the White or Grey lists or in any open tabs

reasonTabsWereIgnored.message: and also open tabs were ignored
reasonTabsWereIgnored.description: Clean because of sub.google.com is not in the White or Grey lists and also open tabs were ignored

reviewLinkMessage.message: Kiitos kun käytät $cadTitle$ä. Jos pidit siitä, niin jätä arvostelu.
reviewLinkMessage.description: Thanks for trying out Cookie AutoDelete. If you liked it, then please give a review.

activeModeText.message: Käytä automaattista puhdistusta? Viive ennen puhdistusta:
activeModeText.description: Enable Automatic Cleaning? Delay Before Cleaning:

showNumberOfCookiesInIconText.message: Show Number of Cookies for that Domain
showNumberOfCookiesInIconText.description: Show Number of Cookies for that Domain

cookieCleanUpOnStartText.message: Clean Cookies from Open Tabs on Startup
cookieCleanUpOnStartText.description: Clean Cookies from Open Tabs on Startup

contextualIdentitiesEnabledText.message: Enable Support for Firefox's Container Tabs
contextualIdentitiesEnabledText.description: Enable Support for Firefox's Container Tabs

localstorageAndContextualIdentitiesWarni.message: Enabling both LocalStorage Cleanup and Container Tabs might cause some unwanted side effects due to API Limitations
localstorageAndContextualIdentitiesWarni.description: Enabling both LocalStorage Cleanup and Container Tabs might cause some unwanted side effects due to API Limitations

toGreyListText.description: Add to Greylist (Clean on Browser Restart)

exportURLSTitle.message:
A timestamp will be appended to the filename on export.
Having trouble downloading?  Right-Click this button and click 'Save Link As...' to download.
exportURLSTitle.description:
A timestamp will be appended to the filename on export.
Having trouble downloading?  Right-Click this button and click 'Save Link As...' to download.

faqText.message: Frequently Asked Questions, Common issues and solutions
faqText.description: Frequently Asked Questions, Common issues and solutions

disableAutoDeleteText.message: Toggle to disable automatic cleanup (manual mode)
disableAutoDeleteText.description: Toggle to disable automatic cleanup (manual mode)

enableAutoDeleteText.message: Toggle to enable automatic cleanup (automatic mode)
enableAutoDeleteText.description: Toggle to enable automatic cleanup (automatic mode)

toggleNotificationText.message: Toggle to enable or disable notifications
toggleNotificationText.description: Toggle to enable or disable notifications

menuText.description: Menu.  Only shown when the settings screen is small / when the hamburger icon shows / when the menu is collapsed.
